trends: There have been no other sightings in Cataula
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing in my yard after the fire truck's left from a house fire across the street. As they were leaving , we noticed what appeared to be a long white cylinder with a black ring around one area of this. It was falling from the sky a little fast but, not too fast. It had a dome on one end that also had the same color light on the inside of it & it was round shaped. The first thing I thought of was, it's a UFO ! I have seen this very same object 2 day's before this happened. There was no sound at all. We could actually see the redish tint all around the object. As I recorded it, it started falling from the south going to the south west area & then it was gone. I was amazed at what we saw but, I also knew it wasn't right. In my opinion, I knew it was a UFO ! No sound at all, no wing's, and the fact that it had a dome on it was really out of place . It didn't leave any trail of smoke at all. Totally silent. While I was recording, I watched it go behind the tree's & disappear. I'm trying to get an answer to this.
Summary: It came out of no where without a sound. Flew behind the tree's & was gone.
